kingdom.quote: Trù tính, hòa giải, trị liệu: Đem lại trật tự và sức khỏe cho mọi người.
kingdom.long_description: Dân trên sa mạc sớm học được rằng để tồn tại, họ cần có nhau, và tốt nhất là càng nhiều người càng tốt. Giờ đây, du khách thấy họ là những chủ nhà hào phóng sở hữu hàng hóa từ khắp nơi trên thế giới.
kingdom.post_selection_description: , giao thiệp hấp dẫn, thương nhân gian trá.

shop_info.name: Đoàn thương mại Iskender
shop_info.title: Đoàn thương mại Iskender trở lại!

shop_info.name: Đoàn thương mại Iskender
shop_info.title: Đoàn thương mại Iskender trở lại với nhiều thứ hơn!

shop_info.name: Đoàn thương mại Iskender
shop_info.title: Đoàn thương mại Iskender trở lại!

bulletin_message.000: Haha, không có gì giống như cảnh tượng của tiền đồn mới, phải không? Với sự chăm chỉ của bạn, vùng đất hoang vắng này sẽ sớm trở thành nơi giàu có và thịnh vượng! Chúng tôi sẽ quay lại vào ngày mai với cửa hàng, nhưng trong thời gian chờ đợi, đây là số tiền bắt đầu mà gia đình bạn đã gửi cùng:
bulletin_message.001: Khỉ giữ bạn, bạn bè! Luôn luôn là niềm vui khi thấy một bên đến được điểm giao dịch được chỉ định. Theo hợp đồng, chúng tôi sẽ trở lại với cửa hàng vào ngày mai. Trong thời gian chờ đợi, đây là nguồn cung cấp ban đầu mà gia đình bạn đã đặt hàng:
bulletin_message.002: Đoàn thương mại Iskender luôn tìm nơi mới để nghỉ giữa tuyến đường. Chúng tôi rất vui được gặp bạn, các bạn! Chúng tôi sẽ quay lại cửa hàng vào ngày mai, nhưng trong thời gian chờ đợi, hãy có một mẫu hàng hóa của chúng tôi, để bạn bắt đầu:
bulletin_message.003: Tất cả đã sẵn sàng để bắt đầu tiền đồn mới, eh! Các bạn của tôi, sa mạc chào đón những đứa con của nó. Chúng tôi sẽ quay lại vào ngày mai để kiểm tra bạn, nhưng trong thời gian chờ đợi, cha mẹ bạn đã gửi những đồ dùng này để giúp bạn bắt đầu:
bulletin_message.004: Aha, một đối tác tiềm năng mới cho Đoàn thương mại Iskender! Ngày mai chúng ta phải quay lại với cửa hàng, nhưng hãy nói với bạn điều gì: hãy đầu tư hạt giống này, và xem bạn có thể biến nó thành gì cho chúng tôi, hả?

simple_message.choice_000: Cảm ơn nhiều, Người cao tuổi đáng kính!

shop_info.name: Trái đất được đánh bóng của Vosker Saji

shop_info.name: Tấm thảm da cừu quý giá của Rin

shop_info.title: Cửa hàng kỳ lạ về gỗ quý hiếm đến

shop_info.name: Farmer Gem's Farm Supplies
shop_info.title: Farmer Gem's supply cart rolls into town

bulletin_message.000: Well, in addition to being distinguished as an official township, you will gain recognition from traders and travelers from all over Hearth. We shall also offer you architectural blueprints we've collected through our trades with other Rayya's Children settlements.

The Church of Rayya, more commonly known as Her Mystery, can designate an outpost as an official Church waypoint. In order to be eligible, Thị trấn chúng ta must provide a shrine where travelers and weary wanderers can give offerings to Monkey and pay homage to Guildmother Rayya.

shrine_reqs.choice_001: How else can I gain renown?

bulletin_message.000: Well, getting to the point, I believe we can both benefit from an agreement of sorts. We at the Iskender Agency strive to create the most comprehensive maps of Hearth, and so we wish to detail any notable establishments and outposts such as yours. With your permission, of course!

details.choice_000: What do I get in return?

bulletin_message.000: Great! Let us get this process rolling then. First of all, how would you like to be known? We can put you on the map as a place renowned for its: Trading Post, Shrine of Her Mystery, or Exotic Goods.
How would you like to be known? We can put you on the map as a place renowned for its: Trading Post, Shrine of Her Mystery, or Exotic Goods.
Greetings, friends of [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! It's been some time since we've last visited this outpost. Looks like you've been making good use of the starting supplies we delivered.

In order to gain renown in Exotic Trade, Thị trấn chúng ta must engage in trades with visitors from faraway lands and thus gain access to a variety of goods that would be otherwise unobtainable in your area.

exotic_goods_reqs.choice_001: How else can I gain renown?

bulletin_message.000: Monkey be with you, [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! I shall leave you a bird, so you may summon me to evaluate your progress!

Why, our cartographers are making preparations for the next printing iteration of the Iskender Map of Hearth. While we at Iskender Trading Agency are known for trade, we also pride ourselves for the accuracy and utility of our maps. Settlements and routes from across the world are depicted in the finest detail.

In order to gain renown as a Trading Post for the Masses, it is important that your city be a welcoming place for traders and travelers to visit and trade goods amongst each other. I shall give your potter a recipe; build a monument which can act as a grand and inviting display at the heart of your settlement.

trading_post_reqs.choice_001: How else can I gain renown?

bulletin_message.000: Excellent! In addition to an appropriate monument, Thị trấn chúng ta will also need to have accumulated a certain level of worth. I shall leave the requirements with you, should you wish to consult with them again, or should a different path come to appeal more than your initial chosen road.

I will give your potter a sacred shrine recipe, passed down from Her Mystery's most Elite Officers. They say the ingredients are found in ancient structures and loot chests; build the monument and I shall return to verify if it meets the specifications of the Church Elders.

I will give your potter a recipe. You can obtain the ingredients from traveling merchants and trading caravans, but note that not many travelers carry them. Build a monument that incorporates these ingredients to demonstrate your excellence in trading exotic goods.

unlock_exotic_trade_monument.bulletin_title: Potter Recipe Unlocked: The Ever-Burning Flame

unlock_monkey_shrine_monument.bulletin_title: Potter Recipe Unlocked: Her Mystery's Shrine

unlock_trading_post_monument.bulletin_title: Potter Recipe Unlocked: The Trader Monument

trading_post_tier_2_reached.title: Iskender Agent Naryal Returns
trading_post_tier_2_reached.message: Congratulations, [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! Thị trấn chúng ta is eligible to be officially recognized as a township! I have brought building materials and trade agreements, as is customary.
trading_post_tier_2_reached.reward_message: By honorary decree of Rayya's Children, we recognize:
trading_post_tier_2_reached.reward_message_ctd: For its excellence as a world-class trading post. The town is hereby eligible for:

rayyas_children_town_tier_quest.title: Quest for a township
rayyas_children_town_tier_quest.text: Satisfy any of the following requirements to gain sufficient renown to qualify for township status:

exotic_trade_tier_2_reached.reward_message_ctd: For excellence in foreign and exotic trade. The town is hereby eligible for:

shrine_tier_2_reached.reward_message_ctd: For its hospitality and iconic shrine to Her Mystery. The town is hereby eligible for:

shrine_upgrade_valor.reward_message: By decree of the Iskender Trading Company, we recognize:
shrine_upgrade_valor.reward_message_ctd: Cho những hành động dũng cảm đáng kinh ngạc trong chiến đấu. Thị trấn này đủ điều kiện để:

achievements.003: Weaver Banners, Throws, and Cushions Recipes

recipe_bulletins.recipe_unlock_weaver: New banner, throw, and cushion recipes for Weaver!

recipe_bulletins.recipe_unlock_weapons_2: New Legendary Shield recipe - Blacksmith, Carpenter, and Mason collaboration!
recipe_bulletins.recipe_unlock_weapons_3: New Legendary Archer recipe - Engineer, Weaver, and Carpenter collaboration!

guildmaster.name: The Trader Monument
guildmaster.description:
This Township shall be known for its productivity, wealth, and trading connections.
  • Allows crafting Chất lượng kiệt tác items
  • Unlocks homely decoration recipes

deity.name: Her Mystery's Shrine
deity.description:
This Township shall seek to learn the secrets of the world, in service of Her Mystery.
  • Blesses all citizens with +1 to Mind, Body, and Spirit
  • Unlocks Monkey-inspired decoration recipes

valor.name: The Ever-Burning Flame
valor.description:
This Township shall be dedicated to the protection of the whole surrounding region.
  • Unlocks legendary weapon recipes
  • Unlocks exotic decoration recipes

banner_upgrade_cunning.reward_message_ctd: to be an outpost paving the roads to become a trade hub.

banner_upgrade_strength.reward_message_ctd: to be an outpost on its way to be a safe haven for all.

banner_upgrade_vitality.reward_message_ctd: to be an outpost aiming to revive the surrounding nature.

bulletin_message.00: Once the outpost founding forms are filled and back in their satchel, Arke picks it up and starts on her journey back to the closest Iskender Trading Agency office.
A Hearth of Makers, on the other hand, is for those who believe that a town's value is its work, and that its work is best measured in gold.
Cheer, Glory, or Makers - the choice is entirely yours. Think of what matters most to your Settlement, and follow that beacon into the future!

As you know, Hearths have been the cornerstone of Settlements all the way back to the Phoenix Empire.

If not for their glow, Rayya's Children caravans would never find their way in the desert, and our society would have scattered long ago. The type of Hearth also says much about what a Settlement values.
For instance, a Hearth of Cheer is for those who believe that a town's value is found in being a happy home for its citizens.
Finally, a Hearth of Glory is for those who believe that there comes a time when negotiations no longer suffice, and the land has to be protected by force.

Hello, again! This time I'm visiting in a more official capacity than usual, and without my trading goods. We at the Iskender Trading Company are very impressed with your Outpost's progress, and have decided that Đến lúc để officially update your member status to that of 'Settlement'.

Before we can do that, though, it is customary to choose a Hearth to represent Thị trấn chúng ta.

intro.choice_001: [skip] We know what Hearth we want.

bulletin_message.00: The messenger fox returns, with a reply from Amyyria Iskender.

Conversely, we expect you to start considering the next step in your Outpost's evolution. Although most of our partner outposts opt to focus on trade, we think other approaches to prosperity are equally valuable to Rayya's Children, and it is always up to the Outpost themselves to make that decision.

Monkey keep you!
Amyyria Iskender
Iskender Trading Company


P.S. A small gift for you, for good luck ✨

Congratulations on your Founding!

Your Outpost is now officially in the company ledger, and I trust that you're well on your way to becoming our primary contact in the region!

To help you achieve this worthy goal, we'll be directing more of our trading partners towards your outpost in the days to come, and encouraging those leaving their caravans to head to [str(i18n_data.town_name)].

Of course, with our backing, everyone will know that when you call something a 'Masterwork', you mean it! It's in the bylaws, after all.

I have no doubt that traders will soon be going out of their way to pay Thị trấn chúng ta a visit. I'd expect lots of company!

Alright, enough with all this business talk - I'm going to find a spry young thing and get to dancing!

What? You're only as old as you act!

(Adia nods, mumbling to herself. 'Hmm... yes, I suppose this will do nicely, nicely indeed.')

Oh! Children, you have chosen well to sign on as part of the Merchant Council's network, and we are certainly glad to have you!

msg1.bulletin_title: Adia Radie leans in, examining the Monument

bulletin_message.00:
Ha! I guess that's true!

So, we scrounged up some weapon designs from dusty old tomes that the Rayya's Mystery folks had stashed away - I brought some copies along to give out to your crafters, so they can try and work out how to put 'em together.

msg2.choice_000: I'm sure they'll figure it out!

bulletin_message.00:
No doubt!

Alright, I've been on my feet all day, so I'm gonna go grab a bowl or a slice of something! Xin chúc mừng!

Wow, I bet this can be seen from miles off! Those goblins will be running scared before long!

I'm so glad you decided to sign up with us - there's not too many of us Painted Dogs yet, but we're growing fast because of Towns like you!

Henceforth, this blessed Shrine will bestow a little of Her Mystery upon each of you.

Ponder it. Take that curiosity out into the world with you as you trade, or explore, or welcome strangers into Thị trấn chúng ta hoping to overhear some tantalizing new bit of information.
Of course, we at the Temple will expect a regular report of any goings on. That can wait, though - for now, it's time for all of us to eat, drink, and be merry!

Monkey keep you, sisters and brothers. What a suitable shrine you've built!

I especially enjoy the key hanging from Monkey's tail - what lock is it meant for? What could be hidden behind that lock? Truly, a mystery!

Wonderful, wonderful! Thị trấn chúng ta certainly does the Iskender name proud!

Thank you for throwing such a nice reception for me and our guests.

This monument we're celebrating about is special, by the way - a Town's founding imbues a special sort magic into it.

Building more statues and such can serve decorative purposes, but they won't have the same sort of glow, if you know what I mean.

(Yap! Yap!)

Yes, yes, Arke, I know, Đến lúc để go.

I'd love to stay longer, but there's other, less self-sufficient Caravans out there that need my attention.

Congratulations on all your success, and thanks for not having ever made too much paperwork for me.

Hello, [str(i18n_data.town_name)]!

I'm so glad to finally get to see your Settlement with my own eyes! I thought Naryal's accounts of its splendor were exaggerations, but I see now that they may actually have been understatements!

Well, let's move on to business. Here are the potential sponsors I mentioned in my last letter. Please take a moment to hear what they have to say.

Monkey keep you, brothers and sisters! I am Nona Trist, a High Priestess of Her Mystery. Grandmother Rayya has left us a task, to explore the world and find out all its secrets. One way we work towards this is by sponsoring towns here, far from the heart of Rayya's Children territories.

In return for our sponsorship, we typically ask a Settlement to build a Shrine to Her Mystery, to serve as a constant reminder that the world is a mysterious place, rife with opportunities for exploration and learning. Once the shrine is blessed, it will spread its magical effects among your populace, empowering them in strange and mysterious ways.

Dedicating a Shrine of Her Mystery will grant all of Thị trấn chúng tasfolk a +1 boost to the Mind, Body, and Spirit attributes.

Come here, children! I'm Adia Radie, Chair of the Merchant Council, and an admirer of this budding little Settlement of yours. So efficient! So promising! I've visited many a young Settlement in my long years, but I never tire of seeing good, hardworking Children of Rayya settling down and expanding the reach of our trading routes.

Adia produces a handful of hard candy from her robes and distributes them among the group.

As you know, the Merchant Council is the main sponsor of Rayya's Children Towns, so I'm sure you aren't surprised to see me here. We would love to have you join the Council - I think your Settlement can produce and export some of the finest goods Rayya's Children have to offer, and keep the tradition of excellency that we are known for.

Dedicating a Trader Monument will grant the ability to create Masterwork-quality furniture and decorations, which are considerably better than those of Chất lượng tuyệt vời.

Hey! I am Emeret Kaver! You probably haven't heard of me yet, but I'm the leader of The Painted Dogs, a group of young people trying to make sure our peaceful ways survive the hardships of the modern world, be it goblin raids or undead infestations, by training Rayya's Children in various self defense techniques. And now we are looking for Settlements to join our numbers!

We think your people have shown that they have the strength needed to protect this Settlement, and even some of your neighbors, so we'd like you to build an Ever-Burning Flame to be a beacon of safety in these lands, and in return we will share some of our latest weapon and armor schematics.

Dedicating the Ever-Burning Flame will grant you recipes for new, highest-tier weapons.

So! Now you've met everyone, and my job as the facilitator is coming to a close. I don't want to influence your choice, but I can assure you they're all very powerful and can help Thị trấn chúng ta achieve its full potential.

I'll leave the plans for each of the shrines and whatnot with your Potters.

It's been a pleasure visiting, and I'm looking forward to seeing you again at the dedication ceremony!

I am currently making arrangements to finally visit your Settlement myself, and when I do, I will be bringing along several individuals who have expressed interest in sponsoring up and coming Settlements like yours. These are highly regarded members of our society, so be sure to have your best teaware ready!

Monkey keep you!
Amyyria Iskender
Iskender Trading Company

Dear [str(i18n_data.town_name)]-ites,

I have received many reports from our trading partners singing your Settlement all kinds of praises. I am so glad that our investment in your Outpost is bearing fruit so quickly!

As you may remember from our contract, the final service we offer any Outpost under our guidance is to connect them to some prominent members of Rayya's Children society, who can help them cross that final bridge to becoming a Town.
Looks like Amyyria is getting in touch with us again!

shrine_upgrade_deity.title: Thị trấn được thành lập
shrine_upgrade_deity.reward_message: By decree of the Iskender Trading Company, we recognize:
shrine_upgrade_deity.reward_message_ctd: For learning the mysteries of the world. The town is hereby eligible for:

shrine_upgrade_guildmaster.reward_message_ctd: For excellence in craftsmanship and trade. The town is hereby eligible for:

recipe_bulletins.recipe_unlock_potter: New pot, floral, and workbench decoration recipes for Potter!

bulletin_message.00:
Once you have made your choice, please record them on the provided forms and send them back with Arke. And please be sure to feed her before she leaves. She prefers berries, but she'll accept prickly pears as well.

Monkey keep you,
Amyyria Iskender,
Iskender Trading Company

A determined-looking fennec fox approaches, carrying in its snout a leather satchel with "Iskender Caravan Official Mail" stitched onto it. She drops it by the town standard and settles down, looking up expectantly.

open_letter.choice_001: [skip] We know what banner we want.

bulletin_message.00:
Dear Caravan [str(i18n_data.town_serial_number)],

Thank you for volunteering to establish a new outpost so far to the West! We here at the Iskender Trading Company are delighted that you chose us to facilitate your founding.

Once the paperwork is in order, an official company caravan led by Agent Naryal Iskender will start a new route to your outpost.

To start, in order for us to enter your outpost into the company ledger, you must choose a name, as well as a Standard.

The Standard declares to the rest of Rayya's Children the purpose behind you settling down, though we have found that it is even more effective at inspiring an outpost's own people.
Apparently, in addition to the letter, Arke's satchel contains a smaller satchel full of coins, labeled "Outpost Founding Incentive".

Monkey keep you, friend! Now that our existing contract is resolved, we'd like to remind you that the Iskender Trading Company is always open for repeat business!

In fact, since this collaboration went so well, if you'd like to establish another town, we'd be happy to sponsor a larger caravan that can carry a few of your citizens from here, as well as some extra goods and records. Just let us know when you're ready!

Re-embarking allows you to carry over up to 3 citizens, 10 items, and all your unlocked recipes when starting a new town.
